keyMoments.description: Luffy orders the crew to retreat for the first time, recognizing they cannot win against their current enemies.
keyMoments.significance: A major turning point showing Luffy's growth as captain - prioritizing survival over pride.

keyMoments.description: Chopper transforms into Monster Point out of desperation to protect the crew.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's willingness to sacrifice everything to protect each other.

keyMoments.description: Zoro becomes the first crew member to disappear via Kuma's power, beginning the crew's forced separation.
keyMoments.significance: This marks the end of the crew's journey together until the time skip. It's one of the most traumatic events in the series, as the crew watches helplessly as their nakama vanishes.
